main event: Two balls of light, cream to white in color, were observed in the sky over Biloxi, Mississippi on December 18, 1956.
interesting points: The objects were side by side, flashing and steady, about the size of a half dollar.
The objects made a sound similar to a jet aircraft.
The objects were indistinct in shape but very bright.
The objects were stationary for 10-15 seconds.
The objects then followed a course consistent with a jet aircraft, paralleling its path before suddenly rising and joining another similar object.
